name: Space Quest Pizza
description:
A MULTI-PLAYER SINGLE-PLAYER EXPERIENCE

Join in with a gang of 2 or 4 friends to play this crazy quest for pizza in a Co-op Single player game.

The goal is simple, collect pizza and avoid enemies but with a twist, all the players control the same character together.

Test your teamwork as you decipher who controls what?

Instructions

Step 1 : Scan the QR code for 2 or 4 players.

Step 2 : Click on screen to begin the game.

Step 3 : Try not to shout at each other as you navigate through space in a quest for collecting pizza.

Good luck have fun!

This game is a prototype and feedback is highly appreciated! :D
